othello.model.player

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • othello.model.player.Player
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HumanPlayer, LocalComputerPlayer, RemotePlayer

    public abstract class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class for players. Can either be: Human, local AI or remote player. Contains markerID which dictates player colour and name which is the players name
